tool_description: Calculates the impact of projected labor cost changes on organizational budgets, cash flow, and financial ratios.

current_annual_budget.description: Current annual organizational budget in dollars

projected_labor_costs.description: Array of projected annual labor costs

current_labor_percentage.description: Current labor costs as percentage of total budget (10-90)

error_messages: Invalid budget amount: Current annual budget must be a positive number greater than zero.
Empty projections: Projected labor costs array cannot be empty.
Invalid labor percentage: Current labor percentage must be between 10 and 90 percent.
Revenue projection mismatch: Revenue projections array length must match labor costs array length if provided.
Negative projections: Projected labor costs must be positive numbers.
usage: Provide current_annual_budget, projected_labor_costs array, and current_labor_percentage. Optionally include revenue_projections for comprehensive impact analysis. Returns budget impact metrics and ratios.

labor_cost_ratio_trend.description: Labor costs as percentage of budget by year

cumulative_impact.description: Total cumulative budget impact over projection period
